description: A partially flooded urban area where an entire district fell into underground waterways. Combines drowning hazards, underwater exploration, and survivor community.

flooded_plaza.name: Flooded Plaza
flooded_plaza.description: Entry point. Waist-deep murky water. Survivors cling to elevated platforms.

drowning_sailor_cave.name: Drowning Sailor Cave
drowning_sailor_cave.description: Underwater cave where a sailor is trapped. Time-critical rescue.

submerged_library.name: Submerged Library
submerged_library.description: A scholarly institution now half-underwater. Multi-depth structure.

canal_networks.name: Canal Networks
canal_networks.description: Maze of flooded tunnels connecting locations. Multiple routes with different hazards.

merchants_wreck.name: The Merchant's Wreck
merchants_wreck.description: An overturned trade barge where a merchant is trapped under cargo.

camp_leader_mira.name: Camp Leader Mira
camp_leader_mira.description: A middle-aged woman with tired eyes but iron determination. She manages the survivors.

transitions.friendly->allied: Player rescues both survivors OR camp morale high
transitions.any->disappointed: Player lets survivor die without trying

rescue_garrett.description: A sailor is trapped in the caves. He was looking for supplies.
rescue_garrett.reward: Access to Jek's advanced swimming lessons

rescue_delvan.description: The merchant Delvan hasn't returned from his supply run.

camp.summary: Mira gestures at the ragged platforms. 'We're what's left. When the waters rose, most didn't make it. We survive by scavenging and hoping.'

help.summary: Mira's eyes sharpen. 'Two people are missing. Garrett went diving for supplies and hasn't come back. Delvan the merchant was checking his old warehouse.'

garrett.summary: 'The sailor. Good man, reckless. He swims better than anyone but he's been gone too long. The underwater caves to the east.'

delvan.summary: 'A trader who refused to abandon his goods. Went north through the canals to his barge. That was two days ago.'

old_swimmer_jek.name: Old Swimmer Jek
old_swimmer_jek.description: An elderly man with weathered skin and webbed fingers - a birth defect that made him legendary.

teach_swimming_basic.effect: Breath holds last 50% longer, swim speed normal

teach_swimming_advanced.effect: Breath holds last 100% longer, can navigate deep areas safely

swimming.summary: 'The water isn't your enemy, it's your element if you know how to move with it. I can teach you. For a price, or for a favor.'

price.summary: 'Five gold for the basics. Or bring me something to eat - real food, not this waterlogged garbage.'

favor.summary: 'Find Garrett. He was my apprentice before he got too bold. Bring him back and I'll teach you everything I know for free.'

child_survivor.name: Child Survivor
child_survivor.description: A young child clutching a sodden doll. They watch everything with wide eyes.

doll.summary: The child hugs the doll tighter. 'She keeps me safe. The water tried to take her but I held on.'

scared.summary: The child looks up. 'The library lady is still down there. She clicks and hums. I think she's lonely.'

hint_dialog.about_archivist: Provides hint about Waterlogged Archivist being approachable

sailor_garrett.name: Sailor Garrett
sailor_garrett.description: A young man with tattooed arms, currently drowning. His eyes show terror.

transitions.stabilized->rescued: Led to surface OR exhaustion cured and swims out

option_1.effect: Breath restored, stabilized. Still exhausted, needs help swimming out.

option_2.effect: Can swim but still drowning. Needs to reach surface fast.

option_3.requires: Player has swimming skill OR exceptional strength

effects: Can become companion with diving expertise

treasure.summary: 'I found something down there before I got trapped. A merchant's cache, sealed tight. I can show you where if you want to dive for it.'

waterlogged_archivist.name: Waterlogged Archivist
waterlogged_archivist.description: A bronze automaton in the shape of a robed figure. Water streams from its joints but it still functions.

transitions.any->destroyed: Combat (why would you fight a librarian?)

information.requires: Prove scholarly intent (present book OR answer riddle)
information.provides: Information about any topic in library collection

deep_archive_key.provides: Enchanted bubble (allows breathing in deep archive)

purpose.summary: The construct's voice is waterlogged but clear. 'I am Archive Attendant Seven. My function: preserve and provide. The waters came but my duty remains.'

library.summary: 'The collection spans three levels. Surface materials are damaged but readable. Submerged texts require protection. Deep archives require... special access.'

access.summary: 'Demonstrate scholarly intent. Prove you value knowledge over mere acquisition. Then we may discuss further access.'

scholarly_intent_tests.present_book: Any readable book triggers positive response
scholarly_intent_tests.answer_riddle: 'What has pages but cannot be read when wet?' (Answer: a drowned book, or any thoughtful response)
scholarly_intent_tests.discuss_knowledge: Asking meaningful questions about lore grants trust +1

merchant_delvan.name: Merchant Delvan
merchant_delvan.description: A portly man pinned under cargo. His face is pale from blood loss.

rescue_requirements.step_2: Free from cargo (use lever OR high strength)
rescue_requirements.step_3: Splint leg or carry to safety

effects: Substantial reward (50 gold, rare items from cargo)
Permanent discount (25%) on all merchant services
Connection to black market contacts in Civilized Remnants

trapped.summary: 'My leg... the cargo shifted when the barge tipped. I can't feel my foot. Please, there's a lever in the hold, you could...'

reward.summary: 'Save me and I'll make it worth your while. My contacts, my goods, my connections - they'll all serve you.'

canal_eel.name: Canal Eel
canal_eel.description: A large eel that has adapted to the flooded canals. It watches but doesn't attack.

behavior.if_attacked: Fights back with electric shock (stuns for 1 turn)
behavior.if_fed: Becomes passive, may help find paths

air_bladder.name: air bladder
air_bladder.description: An animal bladder filled with preserved air. Allows breathing underwater temporarily.
air_bladder.effect: Restores breath to full when used. Works in flooded_stacks depth.

waterproof_sack.name: waterproof sack
waterproof_sack.description: An oiled leather bag that keeps contents dry.
waterproof_sack.effect: Items stored within are protected from water damage

water_pearl.name: water pearl
water_pearl.description: A luminescent pearl that glows with inner light. Found in the deep archive.
water_pearl.use: Required for waystone repair in Nexus

ancient_tome.name: ancient tome
ancient_tome.description: A perfectly preserved book in a waterproof case. Its contents describe the pre-disaster world.

lever.name: lever
lever.description: A sturdy iron bar useful for prying.
lever.use: Can free Delvan from cargo, can also clear collapsed canal route

water_bloom.name: water bloom
water_bloom.description: A flower that grows only in the flooded library. Glows faintly blue.
water_bloom.use: Trade item for Bee Queen in Beast Wilds

drowning.recovery: Reach breathable area OR use breathing item

hypothermia.description: Cold water exposure in deep areas
hypothermia.progression: 5 severity per turn in cold water
hypothermia.effects: At 50: slowed movement. At 80: health damage. At 100: incapacitation.

water_levels.ankle: No swimming needed, no breath depletion
water_levels.chest: Movement very slow, no breath depletion

to_nexus.notes: Water does not flood into Nexus (magical barrier)

cross_region_items.water_bloom: To Beast Wilds for bee queen trade

rescued_npc_effects.garrett_rescued: Appears in camp, teaches diving, reveals treasure location
rescued_npc_effects.delvan_rescued: Provides black market contact for Civilized Remnants

swimming_skill.applies_everywhere: Any water area in game benefits from skill

narrative_role.core_tension: Who do you save when you can't save everyone?

time_pressure.both_simultaneously: Very difficult to save both without preparation

player_choices_matter: Saving Delvan provides economic and black market benefits
Saving both is possible but requires planning
Letting either die affects camp morale and available services

commitment_system.description: Player can make implicit commitments to help NPCs. Commitments create stakes beyond the base deed.

garrett_commitment.note: Physics doesn't care about promises - drowning continues regardless
garrett_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: +2 gratitude (beyond base +4). Garrett shares treasure location immediately.

withdrawal_response.dialog: Garrett's eyes widen in panic, but then... acceptance. 'The cave... east wall... merchant cache... tell Jek...' He points frantically before the current pulls at him.

abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo's form ripples like water. 'He believed you. In his final moments, he waited.'
abandonment_effects.jek_reaction: 'You were there? You SPOKE to him? And you... left?' Old Jek turns away. Advanced swimming lessons unavailable.
abandonment_effects.mira_reaction: Camp Leader Mira: 'I asked you to help. You said you would.' Trust -2, camp morale drops.

delvan_commitment.goal: Free Delvan and stop his bleeding
delvan_commitment.note: Hope slows blood loss slightly - determination to survive
delvan_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: +2 gratitude. Delvan offers additional rare item from cargo.

withdrawal_response.dialog: 'Wait... please...' Delvan's voice weakens. 'My lockbox... combination is my daughter's birthday... fourth month, twelfth day... at least take what you can carry...'

abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo speaks softly. 'He offered you everything for his life. You took nothing and gave nothing.'
abandonment_effects.mira_reaction: Camp morale drops. 'He had family waiting. Did you even try?'

both_commitment_special.note: If player promises both but can only save one:
both_commitment_special.scenario: Player commits to both, saves Garrett, Delvan dies
both_commitment_special.effect: Garrett grateful but camp morale still damaged. Echo: 'You kept one word. The other was drowned by circumstance. Intention matters, but so do results.'
both_commitment_special.partial_penalty: Reduced abandonment penalty (-1 instead of -2) if clearly tried

open_questions.question: Can player save both Garrett and Delvan in one playthrough?
open_questions.proposed: Yes, but requires: (1) Get swimming skill first, (2) Have air bladder ready, (3) Prioritize correctly. Garrett is more urgent (5 turns) but closer. Delvan is slower (10 turns) but farther.

open_questions.question: What treasure does Garrett reveal?
open_questions.proposed: A merchant's cache in a side cave off the drowning sailor cave. Contains gold, potions, and one unique item (perhaps a breathing charm).

open_questions.question: How difficult should the deep archive be to access?
open_questions.proposed: Requires: (1) Advanced swimming OR archivist's enchanted bubble, (2) Light source, (3) Knowledge of where to look (from archivist or research). Water pearl is the reward for this challenge.
